text: (iruti nalaip parriya) unmaiyana vakkuruti nerunkinal, (ataikkanum) kahpirkalin kankal tirantapatiye nilaikutti ninru vitum; (anriyum avarkal;)"enkalukku ketu tan! Niccayamaka nankal itai utacinappatuttiyavarkalakave iruntuvittom; - atu mattumillai - nam aniyayam ceytavarkalakavum iruntu vittom" (enru kuruvarkal)
